    • 方法详细资料

      • concatenate

        public static java.lang.String concatenate(java.lang.String... params)
        Concatenate multiple String by StringBuilder.
        参数:
        params - string parameter
        返回:
        Return the string, after append.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.lang.String str,
                                      java.lang.Object... args)
        Returns a formatted string using the specified format string and arguments. 
             format("aaa-{}-bbb", "yyy");                     =>  "aaa-yyy-bbb"
     format("aaa-{}{}-bbb", "yyy", "xxx");            =>  "aaa-yyyxxx-bbb"
     format("aaa-{}+{}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");          =>  "aaa-yyy+xxx-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}+{1}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");         =>  "aaa-yyy+xxx-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}+{0}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");         =>  "aaa-yyy+yyy-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}+{x}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");         =>  "aaa-yyy+{x}-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}-{x}-{}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");      =>  "aaa-yyy-{x}-xxx-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}-{{x}-{{}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");    =>  "aaa-yyy-{{x}-{xxx-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}-{{x}-{{-1}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");  =>  "aaa-yyy-{{x}-{{-1}-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}-{{x}-{{3}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");   =>  "aaa-yyy-{{x}-{{3}-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}-{{}-{{}-bbb{", "yyy", "xxx");     =>  "aaa-yyy-{xxx-{{}-bbb{"
     format("aaa-{}-{{0}-{{}-bbb-{0}", "yyy", "xxx"); =>  "aaa-yyy-{yyy-{{}-bbb-yyy"
        参数:
        str - The string
        args - The arguments
        返回:
        Returns formatted string

      • split

        public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String str,
                                       char separator)
        Split string by special separator char. 
             split(",ab,cd,ef,gh", ',') => ["", "ab", "cd", "ef", "gh"]
     split(",ab,cd,ef,gh", '|') => [",ab,cd,ef,gh"]
        参数:
        str - the String to parse
        separator - the character used as the delimiter
        返回:
        an array of parsed Strings

      • split

        public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String str,
                                       char separator,
                                       int max)
        Split string by special separator char. 
             split(",ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 0) => ["", "ab", "cd", "ef", "gh"]
     split(",ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 2) => ["", "ab,cd,ef,gh"]
     split("ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 2) => ["ab", "cd,ef,gh"]
     split("ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 3) => ["ab", "cd", "ef,gh"]
        参数:
        str - the String to parse
        separator - the character used as the delimiter
        max - the maximum number of elements to include in the array. A zero or negative value implies no limit
        返回:
        an array of parsed Strings

      • splitWithoutEmpty

        public static java.lang.String[] splitWithoutEmpty(java.lang.String str,
                                                   char separator)
        Split string by special separator char. 
             splitWithoutEmpty(",ab,cd,ef,gh", ',') => ["ab", "cd", "ef", "gh"]
     splitWithoutEmpty("|ab,cd,ef,gh", '|') => ["ab,cd,ef,gh"]
     splitWithoutEmpty("ab||cd,ef,gh", '|') => ["ab", "cd,ef,gh"]
        参数:
        str - the String to parse
        separator - the character used as the delimiter
        返回:
        an array of parsed Strings

      • split

        public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String str,
                                       char separator,
                                       int max,
                                       boolean allowEmpty)
        Split string by special separator char. 
             split(",ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 0, true) => ["", "ab", "cd", "ef", "gh"]
     split(",ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 0, false) => ["ab", "cd", "ef", "gh"]
     split(",ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 2, true) => ["", "ab,cd,ef,gh"]
     split("ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 2, true) => ["ab", "cd,ef,gh"]
     split("ab,cd,ef,gh", ',', 3, true) => ["ab", "cd", "ef,gh"]
        参数:
        str - the String to parse
        separator - the character used as the delimiter
        max - the maximum number of elements to include in the array. A zero or negative value implies no limit
        allowEmpty - is allow element is empty("").
        返回:
        an array of parsed Strings

      • splitExt

        public static <T> T[] splitExt(java.lang.String str,
                               char separator,
                               java.lang.Class<T> clz)

      • splitExt

        public static <T> T[] splitExt(java.lang.String str,
                               char separator,
                               int max,
                               boolean allowEmpty,
                               java.lang.Class<T> clz)
        Split string by special separator char and covert String[] to T[].
        类型参数:
        T - Include primitive data types of java and Any class have valueOf(String) method. example : Integer,Short,Long,Double,Float,Boolean.....
        参数:
        str - the String to parse
        separator - the character used as the delimiter
        max - the maximum number of elements to include in the array. A zero or negative value implies no limit
        allowEmpty - is allow element is empty("").
        clz - The special
        返回:
        Return T[].

      • implode

        public static java.lang.String implode(char separator,
                                       java.lang.Object... array)
        Join array elements with a string. 
             implode(new String[]{"a", "b", "c"}, '-') => "a-b-c"
        参数:
        separator - The special glue string
        array - The array of strings to implode.
        返回:
        Return the joined String.

      • implode

        public static java.lang.String implode(char separator,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Object> list)

      • implode

        public static java.lang.String implode(java.lang.Object[] array,
                                       char separator)
        Join array elements with a string. 
             implode(new String[]{"a", "b", "c"}, '-') => "a-b-c"
        参数:
        array - The array of Object to implode.
        separator - The special glue string
        返回:
        Return the joined String.

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(java.lang.CharSequence cs)
        Check if a CharSequence is null or empty (equals "").
        参数:
        cs - The checked CharSequence
        返回:
        Return true if the string is not null and !.equals("").

      • randomString

        public static java.lang.String randomString(int size,
                                            java.lang.String... keys)
        Return an random string
        参数:
        size - array length
        keys - The key's datasource
        返回:
        Return an random string.

      • randomUniqueString

        public static java.lang.String[] randomUniqueString(int size,
                                                    java.lang.String prefix,
                                                    int length,
                                                    java.lang.String keys)
        Return an string array with unique string.
        参数:
        size - array length
        prefix - The prefix string.
        length - The completed string's length
        keys - The key's datasource
        返回:
        Return an array with unique string.
